Person.Organization: BOSTON BIOMEDICAL RESEARCH INSTITUTEUNIV OF MASSACHUSETTS MED SCH WORCESTER
BOSTON BIOMEDICAL RESEARCH INSTITUTEUNIV OF MASSACHUSETTS MED SCH WORCESTER

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: Approved Users are expected to acknowledge the Submitting Investigator(s) who submitted data from the original study to an NIH-designated data repository, the primary funding organization that supported the Submitting Investigator(s), and the NIH-designated data repository (e.g., dbGaP). The acknowledgment statement should include the dbGaP accession number to the specific version of the dataset(s) analyzed. Acknowledgement: The Wellstone FSHD Study was supported by NICHD Wellstone Muscular Dystrophy Cooperative Research Center P50 HD060848 (CPE). For datasets in "iPSC-induced human muscle stem cells for ex vivo and in vivo disease modeling": with additional support from the Muscular Dystrophy Association (480265) (CPE), LGMD 2i Fund (CPE), and NICHD 3R37HD007796 (CPE).

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Facioscapulohumeral Muscular Dystrophy, IRB, NPU, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-FSHD-IRB-NPU-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Facioscapulohumeral Muscular Dystrophy. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Musculoskeletal Diseases, IRB, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-MUS-SKEL-IRB-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Musculoskeletal Diseases. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
